name: illegibility
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being impossible or almost impossible to read: Thousands of ballots were voided by election officials because of illegibility. The names on the monument have faded into illegibility. Related word
illegible
More examplesFewer examplesThe illegibility of the signature could be a problem.I was looking at an old gravestone whose lettering had been worn to illegibility by time.Please excuse the illegibility of my handwriting; I do not have much light to write by.Because of the illegibility of the transcript, we cannot be sure of the details of the conversation.The plastic tags are tiny to the point of complete illegibility.
